markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Juxtaposition Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1262)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 19</row>

**Price** 225 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Juxtaposition ammunition_ quivers with anticipation, as if the projectile wishes to constantly be in motion. When an activated _juxtaposition ammunition_ hits a creature, it doesn't deal the Strike's normal damage. Instead, the target must succeed at a DC 28 Will save or be teleported to a safe, unoccupied square of your choice within 60 feet of its original position and within the weapon's first range increment. On a critical failure, the target is also [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) from the gut-wrenching sensation of sudden movement. Any relocation from the _juxtaposition ammunition_ is [forced movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=451).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Juxtaposition Ammunition
